# version.description: Special field indicating the current version

options.description: Specific options set for this plugin

items.description: `important-plugin` field from config or cmdline, or built-in

options.description: Specific options set for this plugin

lightning-dir.description: `lightning-dir` field from config or cmdline, or default

network.description: `network` field from config or cmdline, or default

allow-deprecated-apis.description: `allow-deprecated-apis` field from config or cmdline, or default

rpc-file.description: `rpc-file` field from config or cmdline, or default

bookkeeper-dir.description: `bookkeeper-dir` field from config or cmdline, or default

bookkeeper-db.description: `bookkeeper-db` field from config or cmdline, or default

always-use-proxy.description: `always-use-proxy` field from config or cmdline, or default

daemon.description: `daemon` field from config or cmdline, or default

wallet.description: `wallet` field from config or cmdline default

large-channels.description: `large-channels` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-dual-fund.description: `experimental-dual-fund` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-splicing.description: `experimental-splicing` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-onion-messages.description: `experimental-onion-messages` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-offers.description: `experimental-offers` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-shutdown-wrong-funding.description: `experimental-shutdown-wrong-funding` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-websocket-port.description: `experimental-websocket-port` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-peer-storage.description: `experimental-peer-storage` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-quiesce.description: `experimental-quiesce` field from config or cmdline, or default

experimental-upgrade-protocol.description: `experimental-upgrade-protocol` field from config or cmdline, or default

invoices-onchain-fallback.description: `invoices-onchain-fallback` field from config or cmdline, or default

rgb.description: `rgb` field from config or cmdline, or default

alias.description: `alias` field from config or cmdline, or default

pid-file.description: `pid-file` field from config or cmdline, or default

ignore-fee-limits.description: `ignore-fee-limits` field from config or cmdline, or default

watchtime-blocks.description: `watchtime-blocks` field from config or cmdline, or default

max-locktime-blocks.description: `max-locktime-blocks` field from config or cmdline, or default

funding-confirms.description: `funding-confirms` field from config or cmdline, or default

cltv-delta.description: `cltv-delta` field from config or cmdline, or default

cltv-final.description: `cltv-final` field from config or cmdline, or default

commit-time.description: `commit-time` field from config or cmdline, or default

fee-base.description: `fee-base` field from config or cmdline, or default

rescan.description: `rescan` field from config or cmdline, or default

fee-per-satoshi.description: `fee-per-satoshi` field from config or cmdline, or default

max-concurrent-htlcs.description: `max-concurrent-htlcs` field from config or cmdline, or default

htlc-minimum-msat.description: `htlc-minimum-msat` field from config or cmdline, or default

htlc-maximum-msat.description: `htlc-maximum-msat` field from config or cmdline, or default

max-dust-htlc-exposure-msat.description: `max-dust-htlc-exposure-mast` field from config or cmdline, or default

min-capacity-sat.description: `min-capacity-sat` field from config or cmdline, or default

addr.description: `addr` field from config or cmdline (can be more than one)

announce-addr.description: `announce-addr` field from config or cmdline (can be more than one)

bind-addr.description: `bind-addr` field from config or cmdline (can be more than one)

offline.description: `true` if `offline` was set in config or cmdline

autolisten.description: `autolisten` field from config or cmdline, or default

proxy.description: `proxy` field from config or cmdline, or default

disable-dns.description: `true` if `disable-dns` was set in config or cmdline

announce-addr-discovered.description: `true`/`false`/`auto` depending on how `announce-addr-discovered` was set in config or cmdline

announce-addr-discovered-port.description: Sets the announced TCP port for dynamically discovered IPs.

encrypted-hsm.description: `true` if `encrypted-hsm` was set in config or cmdline

rpc-file-mode.description: `rpc-file-mode` field from config or cmdline, or default

log-level.description: `log-level` field from config or cmdline, or default

log-prefix.description: `log-prefix` field from config or cmdline, or default

log-file.description: `log-file` field from config or cmdline, or default

log-timestamps.description: `log-timestamps` field from config or cmdline, or default

subdaemon.description: `subdaemon` fields from config or cmdline if any (can be more than one)

fetchinvoice-noconnect.description: `fetchinvoice-noconnect` fields from config or cmdline, or default

accept-htlc-tlv-types.description: `accept-htlc-tlv-types` field from config or cmdline, or not present

tor-service-password.description: `tor-service-password` field from config or cmdline, if any

dev-allowdustreserve.description: Whether we allow setting dust reserves

announce-addr-dns.description: Whether we put DNS entries into node_announcement

require-confirmed-inputs.description: Request peers to only send confirmed inputs (dual-fund only)

commit-fee.description: The percentage of the 6-block fee estimate to use for commitment transactions

min-emergency-msat.description: field from config or cmdline, or default

commit-feerate-offset.description: additional commitment feerate applied by channel owner
